item.title: Household rubbish dumped, 6th October
item.description:
More rubbish sacks dumped on green, foxes have ripped open the bags and scattered it all over the pavement. As soon as it's cleared up, more is dumped. All over Downham there's flytipping problem and It's getting worse. I know it's difficult but there must be something pheonix and lewisham council can do about.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Downham Woodland Walk, Downham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
